participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and stylish, Jordan is passionate about luxury items and has high aspirations.
participant_1.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, Emily enjoys dancing and holds a fondness for her childhood memories.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80s. i love new kids on the block.
